title: Yasuo skin idea Scurge of the seas Yasuo
body:
Pretty much a Pirate themed Yasuo based of the Wokou Japanese pirates  

For some ability new animations I was thinking

Q  Steel tempest : could make a Whirlpool
W :Wind Wall : could have a  Main sail with a skull and bones as the wall
E and R  would stay the same

as for the appearance he would have a scared face with a eye patch 
and be wearing semi samurai armor but on his right shoulder he could have a skull and bones  
 pretty simple but it would be pretty cool

replies.body: no, r would be water instead of wind, and e would leave droplets of water instead of wind
